alert.note: Alert for Billings (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 19 at 10:33PM CDT until June 20 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL GOLDEN VALLEY AND WESTERN BILLINGS COUNTIES... At 933 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Medora, or 23 miles east of Beach, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Golden Valley and western Billings Counties, including the following locations... Sully Creek State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
